The vvonder of vvomen or The tragedie of Sophonisba as it hath beene sundry times acted at the Blacke Friers. Written by Iohn Marston. Marston, John, 1575?-1634.
[56] p.
Printed by Iohn Windet and are to be sold [by W. Cotton] neere Ludgate, London : 1606.
In verse. Bookseller's name from STC. Signatures: A-G⁴. The last leaf is blank. Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
